fullText: Mark Rylance gives a performance for the ages as Johnny 'Rooster' Byron, a dissolute pied piper who lives in a trailer in the woods and holds court for a motley crew of misfits.
dtliExcerpt: Mark Rylance gives a performance for the ages as Johnny 'Rooster' Byron, a dissolute pied piper who lives in a trailer in the woods and holds court for a motley crew of misfits.
bwwExcerpt: Before the show even opened on Broadway last night, Mark Rylance's performance in 'Jerusalem' was generating a big buzz. We've come to expect greatness from this actor -- he was superlative in 'Boeing-Boeing' and 'La Bete' -- and once again he delivers.
showScoreExcerpt: Mark Rylance gives a performance for the ages as Johnny 'Rooster' Byron, a dissolute pied piper who lives in a trailer in the woods and holds court for a motley crew of misfits.
